channel.title: Accessories – Cloud Chemistry
channel.description: Premium eLiquid Custom Handmade to Order™

item.title: Pivoi QI Fast Wireless Charger Pad
item.dc:creator: Matteo Laki
item.description: Compatible Devices: iPhone 11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max/XS Max/X/8/8+, Samsung Galaxy Note 10/Note 10+/S20/S20+/S10+/S9, AirPods Pro and many more!
item.content:encoded:
Pivoi wireless charging pad is a Qi certified charging device that wirelessly charges your Qi enabled devices!

The slim Pivoi wireless charger pad provides ample surface area to charge your device efficiently. Use the Pivoi wireless charging pad to charge compatible devices including iPhone 11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max/XS Max/X/8/8+, Samsung Galaxy Note 10/Note 10+/S20/S20+/S10+/S9, and AirPods Pro and many more.

Specifications: DC Input 5V/2A and 9V/1.6A Output 10W

Design: High grade silicone body with ample surface space, portable and lightweight, suitable use for workplace, home and travel.

Features: Foreign Object Detection ( An LED light will flash rapidly letting you know if something metal is on the charger and needs to be removed.) , Overheat Protection and  Over Voltage Protection.

Package Content:

  • 1 x  Pivoi Wireless Charger Pad
  • 1 x  USB to Micro USB Cable
  • 1 x  Instruction Manual

item.title: USB to Type C Cable
item.dc:creator: Matteo Laki
item.description: Very durable 3.3 ft long charging cable to charge your smartphone or device conveniently!
item.content:encoded:
VOI USB to Type C cables a 3.3 ft long charging cable to charge your smartphone or device conveniently. Get fast charging speed and seamless data transfer with this USB to Type C cable from VOI. Use the VOI USB to Type C cable with your Samsung Galaxy S20 S10 S9 S8 S20 Plus, Note 10 9 8, LG V50 V40, Moto Z Z3, Other Type C smartphones and devices.

Design: Braided Red & Black color, 3.3 ft long charging cable goes through multiple quality tests for durability.

Features: Charges Samsung Galaxy S20 S10 S9 S8 S20 Plus, Note 10 9 8, LG V50 V40, Moto Z Z3, and Other Type C smartphones and devices.

Package Content:

  • 1 x VOI USB to Type C Cable (Red) – 3.3ft

item.title: Polishing Cloth
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Use on all of you vape devices to keep them clean and shiny! Also perfect for cleaning lens of your glasses, mobile screens,and more!
item.content:encoded:
Perfect for polishing that prized Mech!

Use on all of you vape devices to keep them clean and shiny!

  • Hand washable
  • Multiple uses
  • Sleek design

Also perfect for cleaning lens of your glasses, mobile screens, coins and more!

item.title: Cloud Cotton Organic Cotton – 10 Pads
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: 100% Organic Cotton Pads! No Bleach, Cleaners or harsh Chemicals!
item.content:encoded:
100% Organic Cotton Pads!

Not your ordinary cotton from your moms medicine cabinet!

Our 100% Organic Cotton Pads consist of NO bleach, cleaning agents or harsh chemicals! You can really appreciate what mother nature has created here! Observe the tiny seed speckles along with the natural off white hue (that rivals any synthetic or processed material) within these fibers that fluff to perfection in any RDA, RTA or and rebuildable you can think of!

No Bleach, Cleaners or harsh Chemicals!

Package Includes:

  • 10x Cloud Cotton Organic Cotton Pads
  • 1x Container/Package

item.title: Vape Mat – Small
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Protect your precious wooden nightstand from e-liquid spills and also protect your tank and glass tables from devices tipping over!
item.content:encoded:
We have all been there! Protect your precious wooden nightstand from e-liquid spills and also protect your tank and glass tables from devices tipping over!

Now you can have your custom Cloud Chemistry Vape mat for quick access in the bedroom, kitchen, office, garage or any room you need it!

  • Thicker Durable material
  • Mashing Washable
  • Size: 7.5″ x 8.0″
  • Great for stopping spills and “liquid rings”
  • Rubber grip can aid in opening tanks

item.title: Silicone Tank Protector Ring
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Protect your glass tank and furniture!
item.content:encoded:
Breaking the glass on your tank is the worst! Now you can have security and protection!

Protect your glass tank and furniture with a custom Cloud Chemistry Silicone Tank Protector Ring!

Note: *Fits Most Tanks*

item.title: Ceramic Tweezers
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Perfect for coil building, setting and tempering!
item.content:encoded:
CERAMIC FEATURES:

  • Corrosion-resistant
  • Non-Conductive
  • Anti-magnetic
  • Anti-static
  • Heat-resistant

PRODUCT SPECS:

  • Ceramic tips replaceable
  • Tips material: Ceramic
  • Handle material: Stainless Steel
  • Ceramic tips high hardness, smooth surface (will not damage the components)
  • The ceramic tips are shipped with the screws slightly less tightened to ensure safe shipping
  • Suitable for acid occasions, SMD, solder, high-temp operations, clean rooms, precision machinery
  • Perfect for coil building, setting and tempering!

NOTE* Product color/images may vary

item.title: 810 Drip Tips w/Character Cap
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Keep your drip tip clear of debris with these stylish tips with caps!
item.content:encoded:
810 Drip Tip with cap is perfect for the workers that need to keep their drip tip clear of debris. Also great for custom MODS and making statements!

  • Material: Resin
  • Secondary Material: Stainless Steel, Silicone

Package Contents:

  • x 1 Drip Tip
  • x 1 Silicon Cap
  • x1 Safety Chain

item.title: Silicone 18650 Battery Protector
item.dc:creator: James
item.description:
SO MANY COLORS TO CHOOSE FROM!
*Many more colors than what is shown*
item.content:encoded:
Protect yourself and your 18650 batteries with these silicone sleeves!

NEVER LEAVE BATTERIES LYING AROUND UNPROTECTED!

 

  • Made for 18650 batteries of all types
  • Durable Silicone Material
  • Helps distribute shock if dropped
  • Washable and reusable *do not wash with batteries inside*
